author: Martha Kreeger
comment: Based on my location (or areas I have interest) I see real time events tailored to where I am... Everything from traffic, to events, to emergencies and social posts.  The app mines social media, it's always getting more thorough and is easily accessible.  It also follows topics I want.  Really good app... Does not such my phone dry either.  Yay
title: Excellent location based data mining

author: Michael Mchale
comment: Great for those incident you did not hear about yet. Live social media feeds from people at the scene of almost all major incidents. It helps me with my scanner news page.  It help fill in the gaps of details.
title: Awesome app

author: Steve Sherwood
comment: I have mixed feelings on this app. On one hand the app is well laid out, fast and modern. On the other hand I am  not sure what it is trying to achieve. There doesn't seem to be anything displayed that is relevant to me.
title: Mixed feelings

author: Jason Soto
comment: Gone are the days of having to troll through multiple Twitter, FB, etc, feeds to get the latest news.  This app aggregates all of the info and has an awesome interface.
title: The SUPER info app of apps

author: M McNew
comment: I'm not creating an account to use this app. I enjoyed the old app. These appholes don't need to have us connected to every other social media platform. RIDICULOUS.
title: Create an account?

author: Jimmy Pailin
comment: I see the last app update was over a year ago. Maybe that cessation in development explains the app often failing to load pics and vids now. Uninstalling given it's becoming iffy and frequently useless.
title: Failing. Abandonware.

author: Miguel Salas
comment: At first I liked it. But after a while you will see it is all the same stuff...fires, rallies, accidents, and floods. All the same but with no explanation of what caused them.
title: Boring Way to Get News

author: Imani M
comment: I really appreciate the purpose this app serves. Because of this app, I almost always know about breaking news before all of my friends even hear about it.
title: Informative and helpful

author: Steve Fallon
comment: Best app. Glad I have it downloaded. Give me breaking news updates before regular News apps even send out their updates
title: Best App. Breaking news, around the globe news

author: Jose Pro
comment: Banjo was a great tool for trip planning but now UI quit Favorites, Places and Filters per Photo. So bad move now oriented to events
title: Last update ruin UI

author: Jérôme Lapostolet
comment: Very nice way to have an overview of things happening around you or in other place. Can also be nice to get some pictures of events.
title: View on the world

author: Rachel Padden
comment: I don't have a personal Instagram account and that's the only way it's offering me to sign in. Complete waste of time downloading it.
title: Couldn't Even Sign Up

author: James Macleod
comment: I used to love this app and have used it for quite a few years. In fact I had previously given it a five star rating. I Now can't even log-in to it without having an intragram account (no other option to log-in). I don't use instragram, so it seems I will no longer be using Banjo.

author: Vince Torres
comment: If they renamed the app "Guess Where There Was a Shooting Today" they'd have way more downloads. Also pressing play on a video brings up a new window to play the video in, which is not a good look. Lots of other bugs too.
title: They're onto something

author: Seth Callahan
comment: Very cool idea. I was skeptical when I first downloaded the app, but it is top class. Very informative and intuitive. User friendly as well. Hopefully, the developers stay true to themselves, because this is very good.
title: This is a new and welcomed spin on social media

author: Robert Ireland
comment: Can no longer sign in. It doesn't recognise my Instagram account. Used to get in but they are now broken.
title: Can't log in

author: Bryce Best
comment: It won't let me disassociate my old account so I can log in with Twitter and Facebook, so it doesn't really work for me.
title: Not working

author: Philip G
comment: No frills, non-biased information whenever you're willing to peek at the world.
title: Easy 5 stars

author: James Daniels
comment: I tried to uninstall this app.  It still appears on my Samsung Galaxy Gear. Even after I deleted the app. I should not have to reset my watch to deleted a icon
title: Uninstalling

author: Peter Castillo
comment: I use the app for years. I got a new phone and now I need Instagram account to use it.  What a waste.

author: Michael BR
comment: Installed, and it says I need to login to a social Network. The only one listed is Instagram, for which I don't have an account.
title: Doesn't work anymore

author: Damian Strudley
comment: Have found this app very good for rapid world news updates. It's easy to find what you want in each region and you can upload your own news or events. No problems with running or updating program.  Thanks
title: Great for world news

author: K Willis
comment: Can't seem to add FB in my network. I can add some of the other's, please fix.
title: Error Message

author: Ryan "Ducky" Georgieff
comment: what an awesome app the idea of looking around the world through Twitter, Instagram, Picasa! the Map is great I can float thru to the right place! sure it's great for creepers but it's also great for exploring the world!

author: Gavin B
comment: I'm sure it works well if you live in America or Asia. If your UK based then you have to go looking hard for anything that is relevant.
title: Not for my country

author: Mohamed Fayad
comment: Nothing deserves such rating, this app is an exception. I hope it will stay as it is.
title: 5 🌟

author: Peterson Lauriano
comment: I've just started using, and think thats great !!!
title: Very Useful App

author: Ed Walker
comment: I was hoping for more of a updated news blog. If anyone knows of a reliable and current (real time) please let me know. Ty.
title: Not what I had hoped for.

author: Edward Walters
comment: This is much better than all of the other news apps.
title: Great News App

author: J'Vion Johnson
comment: User friendly. You've just got to get the hang of it.
title: It's pretty cool.

author: Matthew Jones
comment: Awesome app I can see what's going on from any event n I do mean "any"even before it could air t.v.!
title: $crilla lifestyle

author: Satish Sonawane
comment: Only instagram account is visible and don't want to sign in using instagram account....
title: Can't sign in using Google account

author: stєvє chαvís
comment: Does not work unless you keep app open

author: Glen Pruden
comment: If I can get sign in  it suck because you can't get sign in

author: Nathan Watchorn
comment: Great concept and potential. Dont really need all the US info though. How about youlet us customise the main page to more local content?

author: A Google User
comment: Had to clear data out for it to work again.
title: Good

author: Minh Marino
comment: cannot get in do not have an Instagram account

author: Tom Hansen
comment: This a very good way to keep up with every thing , breaking news , music etc etc.
title: Up to date .

author: Pete Cho
comment: If you could like, comment, and follow from this app, it would be a home run
title: Great idea, falls short

comment: I would like more control over the feed widget for the GS6, but the app it self is SUPER FUN.
title: Totally Awesome
